options.title: Opciones
options.note: Header for the interface where user can configure various options

learnMore.title: Más información
learnMore.note: Click here to learn more about how our services work

enable.title: Activar
enable.note: Button prompt to turn something on, i.e. click on this to enable

disable.title: Deshabilitar
disable.note: Button prompt to turn something off, i.e. click on this to disable

add.title: Añadir
add.note: To add something to a list
